Submodules

mftools.misc module

Miscellaneous functions.

mftools.misc.remove_outliers(x, n_std=2)[source]

Remove outliers, i.e. values, \(x_i\), which lie outside the range

\[x_i \pm \text{std}(x) * n_{\text{std}},\]

where \(n_{\text{std}}\) denotes the number of standard deviations specified.

Parameters

  • x (ndarray) – Input data.

  • n_std (int, optional) – Number of standard deviations to retain data within (2, by default).

Returns

Data with outliers removed. Returned as 1D array regardless of input shape.

Return type

ndarray
